metadata.dc:author: García De León, R
Rodríguez Costa, T
Puche Mira, A
Casas Fernández, C
Pérez Bryan, J
metadata.dc:description: A new case of Robinow dwarfism syndrome, in a 26 month old child is described. The patient had most of the typical anomalies if the Robinow dwarfism syndrome. Authors describe the phenotype and review the literature on this syndrome.
metadata.dc:title: Síndrome de Robinow (nanismo de la cara fetal). Presentación de un caso y revisión de la literatura.
[Robinow syndrome (fetal-face dwarfism). Presentation of a case and review of the literature].
